post_message: I talked with Fox News’ Gretchen Carlson this afternoon about the House passage of the Homeland Security Appropriations bill. As I told her, we made a commitment in December to seek to block President Obama’s lawless, unconstitutional amnesty using the "power of the purse." Today we upheld that promise by doing our part to pass the strongest, most conservative bill that we could. I hope you’ll take a moment to watch.
